raw_body: Precious in the sight of the Lord is the death of his saints”. Beloved wife of the late Paul Sivaprakasam (Lever Bros), loving daughter of the late David, G and Florence Singanayagam, precious mother/ mother-in-law of Christopher and Shantini, Michael and Shashi, Naomi and Lakshman, Christine and Dinesh, adored grandmother of Daniel, Andrew, Ivan, Matthew, Anya, Christina and Jamie, beloved sister of the late Joyce, Queenie and Evangeline (Mala),
